modal.add_message: Add new employee to the system, in order to track his/her salary and work shifts
modal.edit_message: Edit information to keep the system up-to-date

add_confirmation_modal.message: New employee is successfully added to the system, now you can track his/her salary and work shifts.

deletion_modal.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{employeeName}}? Deleting employee will permanently remove them from the system.
deletion_modal.confirmation_message: Employee was successfully removed from the system. All reports are updated accordingly.
